tool.name: CmipPreparePdb
tool.description: : Class to add CMIP charges and atom types.

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: add_hydrogen
param.label: add_hydrogen
param.help: Add Hydrogen atoms to the structure.

param.name: keep_hydrogen
param.label: keep_hydrogen
param.help: If **add_hydrogen** is True. All hydrogen atoms will be removed before adding the new ones unless this option is set True.

param.name: fix_sidechains
param.label: fix_sidechains
param.help: Complete side chains (heavy atoms, protein only).

param.name: fix_backbone_atoms
param.label: fix_backbone_atoms
param.help: Add missing O, OXT backbone atoms.
